attributes.action: Reimburse golf club members of 4 months of their Membership Fees due to COVID-19
attributes.additional_details: Although COVID isn’t the government’s fault, it is the government that has stopped golfers playing for a third of the year. Support from the government has been issued to many sectors but not to golf club members. NP
attributes.background: I’d like the government to support golf club members who have to lay out hard earned cash to pay their annual subs each year who have been forced to not play for 4 months this year.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a matter for individual golf clubs and members, based on the membership terms.
